title: Is it possible to change Frozen Rift back to normal Rift?
body: I have trouble seeing in my left eye and my computer has trouble running league on medium + graphics, so I just run it on low cos in team fights it will fps lag, so because of this, the graphics loo really bad and make it very difficult see things properly, due to the new snowy rift the blue minions attacks make it really difficult to see and I struggle to play. the map hurts my eyes so i was wondering if there is a way to revert back to the old summoners rift map because its almost unplayable for me.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I don't believe it's possible to revert to the default style of the rift until the Christmas event is over.
